messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Quick question....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/21/03 7:03:14 AM, Cindy0766@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/21/03 7:03:14 AM, Cindy0766@... writes:

<< Do you all ever use the chat room here for this board. Is there a

scheduled time that we could go there and talk.. vent.. whatever? >>

There was some administrative talk of scheduling chats, but it never was
pursued.

Cindy, if you know how to work it (like would it only be available to people
with yahoo messenger?) maybe just pick a time and day and announce it here
(when and how) and try it out!

Sandra

messages.subject: Quick question....
messages.msgSnippet: I promise that this won t be as long as the one before.. lol Do you all ever use the chat room here for this board. Is there a scheduled time that we could go
messages.messageBody:
I promise that this won't be as long as the one before.. lol

Do you all ever use the chat room here for this board. Is there a
scheduled time that we could go there and talk.. vent.. whatever?

Thanks for being here.. can't wait to learn from all ya'lls
experiences..
Cindy
